Package application.game

These classes house the main functions of the game including sprites, the game engine, as well as sound management.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Anchor
    Anchor class, creates anchors at a specified location renders, and provides functionality to move anchors left.
    AssetLoader
    Holds and loads all game assets.
    BackGround
    Creates a background sprite for the background image, moves it left to simulate movement incrementally.
    BaseSprite
    Base class for all sprite, hold all the basic variables necessary for sprite manipulation and animation.
    EvilExam
    Evil exam class, used in creating the evil exam sprites This class inherits all members of the base class base sprite and adds unique methods as well.
    Game
    This class will hold all the relevant material related to the game engine and game states.
    GameOverController
    This is the fx:controller class which links the scene builder members from the GameOverScreen.fxml file to code within this class.
    Louie
    Sprite class for louie, inherits all members from base sprite and creates a new method for jumping.
    ShopItem
    Shop item class creates and adds attributes to shop items.
    SoundManager
    Sound manager class for simple sound management throughout the game.
    StatsManager
    Stats manager to manage in game statistics and coins.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SoundManager.Sounds
    Creates enumerated types to specify each unique sound.

Package application.game Description

These classes house the main functions of the game including sprites, the game engine, as well as sound management.
Author:
Nabeel
